articles.title: Kenilworth's Bubbles and Baskets Laundromat Offer Weekend Laundry Bowl Special
articles.summary: Bubbles & Baskets is offering a 15% discount on all wash, dry, and fold laundry orders during the Superbowl weekend. Customers must say 'Laundry Bowl' to redeem the discount.

articles.title: SALTZMAN: Cool things you didn't know your Smart TV can do
articles.author: Marc Saltzman
articles.summary: LG Smart TVs offer a personalized experience via webOS, recommending content based on user preferences. Furthermore, devices like Roku, Google Chromecast, Amazon Fire TV, and Apple TV can turn regular TVs into smart TVs, adding functionalities through HDMI port connections.

articles.title: Samsung's ultra-thin Galaxy S25 Edge might get a monster camera
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge, a smartphone prioritizing innovation and user experience over raw specifications. Key features include an adaptive refresh rate display (1-120Hz), a robust armor aluminum frame with Gorilla Glass Victus 2, and a focus on sustainability through recycled materials. The S25 Edge aims to redefine the smartphone landscape by setting new benchmarks for mobile technology.

articles.title: 5 Smartphone Trends I Wish Would Die Already
articles.author: Raghav Sethi
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy S25 series introduces AI features, but feels underwhelming with minimal progress in hardware.  ASUS Zenfone 11 Ultra features a bigger display, a shift from its predecessor's compact design. There's also a suggestion for more sustainable plastic backs on phones across price ranges.

articles.title: Moto G (2025) review: An inexpensive, no-frills phone
articles.author: Steve Smith
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Moto G (2025) on January 30, 2025, with a retail price of $200. The Moto G (2025) features a 6.7-inch LCD panel with a 120Hz refresh rate, Android 15, and a 5,000mAh battery. It is available in Forest Gray with 128GB storage.

articles.title: This AI gives you a body double to sit on Zoom calls, so you don't have to
articles.summary: Pickle AI has launched a service that creates an AI persona for users on Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Google Meet. Users record a 5-minute video of themselves which is used to train the AI. The service offers a Basic plan at $24/month for 1,000 minutes and a Pro plan at $60/month for 5,000 minutes, and currently only works on Mac.

articles.title: 27 Urban Outfitters Dresses That Are Sure To Become *That Dress* In Your Closet
articles.author: Rachel Dunkel
articles.summary: Urban Outfitters and Puma offer a wide array of new dresses. The collection includes mini, midi, and maxi dresses in various styles such as lace, satin, denim, and sporty knit, catering to diverse tastes and occasions. Prices range from $48 to $79, providing options across different budgets.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Ultra: Samsung's AI behemoth on the test bench
articles.author: Nachrichten
articles.summary: Samsung launched a new luxury smartphone with a 6.9-inch display, rounder corners, and more angular sides. The smartphone incorporates AI tools as a key feature, representing a notable aspect of Samsung's marketing strategy. The new model's price exceeds 1,300 euros at launch.

articles.title: Your next household hack, straight from 'Shark Tank' — our favorites, from $7
articles.author: Rachel Roszmann
articles.summary: Shark Tank inventions are available on Amazon, offering solutions for home improvement and convenience. These products range from a banana hat to drain hair-catchers and a detergent-free laundry egg. Amazon Prime members get free shipping, while others get free shipping on orders of $35 or more.

articles.title: The Iconic dancemoon MoonRoller Returns with the Launch of the Layer Brush Mini
articles.author: dancemoon
articles.summary: Dancemoon has announced the return of its MoonRoller product and the launch of its new Layer Brush Mini, which will be available for purchase on the brand's official website and Amazon starting February 8th. The MoonRoller is priced at $24.99, while the Layer Brush Mini is priced at $9.99.

articles.title: The Iconic dancemoon MoonRoller Returns with the Launch of the Layer Brush Mini
articles.author: dancemoon
articles.summary: dancemoon announced the return of its flagship product, dancemoon MoonRoller, alongside the launch of a new product called dancemoon Layer Brush Mini. The products are available for purchase globally on the brand's official website and Amazon starting February 8, with dancemoon MoonRoller priced at $24.99 and dancemoon Layer Brush Mini at $9.99.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 and S25 Plus Review: AI That's Enjoyable Without Being Overwhelming
articles.author: Abrar Al-Heeti
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 and S25 Plus smartphones, which share a similar design to their predecessors but introduce enhanced AI features. Key improvements include AI Select tool, Gallery app updates, and Audio Eraser for videos. The phones also feature upgraded cameras and battery life, with models starting at $800 and $1000 respectively.

articles.title: The time is right for Amazon to ship a dual-screen Kindle
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Amazon is speculated to be developing a new dual-screen Kindle e-reader, potentially inspired by Microsoft's Surface Duo design. Panos Panay, head of Devices and Services at Amazon, who previously worked at Microsoft on the Surface Duo project, could be influential in this new Kindle direction. Additionally, Amazon released a new update for the Kindle Scribe, which enhances its Active Canvas feature.

articles.title: Amazon needs to make a dual-screen Kindle - here's why
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Amazon is considering launching a dual-screen Kindle e-reader, potentially inspired by Microsoft's Surface Duo, under the direction of Panos Panay. The new device would mimic the experience of reading a physical book and it could launch on February 26 product event. This new direction aims to create a more compelling e-reader, potentially the most enticing since the original Kindle.

articles.title: Amazon drops price of 'game changer' pressure washer that 'works magic' on dirty paving
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Bosch pressure washer, a "magic" garden gadget. Customers have praised its effectiveness in cleaning patios, driveways, and removing moss and dirt, with many noting its power and ease of use. However, some users have raised concerns about the length of the cable and hose.

articles.title: All-new Mini Cooper 5-Door makes PH debut with P3.799-M asking price
articles.summary: Mini Philippines has launched the 2025 Mini Cooper 5-Door, a gasoline-powered model priced at P3,799,000. Featuring a 2.0-liter turbopetrol engine and the brand's signature design elements, it aims to offer practicality for active lifestyles and young families. The car includes advanced driving-assist systems, Parking Assistant, and Mini OS 9 with Intelligent Personal Assistant.

articles.title: 6 Grooming Tips for a Date Every Man Should Follow This Valentine's Day
articles.author: Sean Zucker
articles.summary: The article recommends using specific grooming products for pre-date preparation. It suggests using "best overall bar soap" for healthy skin with masculine scents and recommends "best-tested body wash" for all skin types, especially sensitive or acne-prone skin, as it's nearly scentless.

articles.title: Aldi is selling dupe of iconic Pizza Express menu item for just £1.35 – so you can have a fakeaway this weekend
articles.author: Amelia Stout
articles.summary: Aldi has launched Stonebaked Dough Balls, a dupe of Pizza Express's dough balls, for £1.35. Additionally, Aldi introduced a Champagne Cheddar Bake for Valentine's Day. Aldi has launched cleaning products and a dupe of Cadbury's Egg'n'Spoon carton.

articles.title: Walmart is selling a 'powerful' $130 wet dry vacuum for $88, and shoppers say it's a 'household must-have'
articles.author: Victoria Garcia
articles.summary: Shark launched the MessMaster Portable Wet Dry Vacuum, now available at Walmart for $88. The vacuum features no loss of suction technology, a one-gallon capacity, and is designed for both indoor and outdoor use. It also includes a self-cleaning function using rinse and ready technology.

articles.title: 44 Random Products Under $20 That Might Become Your New Favorite Things
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Olay introduces Super Serum Body Wash, packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. The Pink Stuff launches "Sqeezy" sponge set for tough cleaning tasks. E.l.f. releases Hydrating Core Lip Shine in "Ecstatic" shade. Glossmetics launches Lychee Overnight Lip Mask and Catrice releases "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. E.l.f's also launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara and L'Oréal Paris launched BB Cream and Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy. Color Wow launched Money Mist and Basic Concepts launched crease-preventing spiral hair ties and Basic Vigor introduced migraine stick.

articles.title: What to know about New York's poultry market shutdowns amid bird flu concerns
articles.author: CBS News
articles.summary: Example Corp. launched AI Assistant Pro, a new service designed to streamline workflows. The AI Assistant Pro includes features like automated task management and personalized recommendations. The service is available for subscription starting July 1, 2024.

articles.title: If You Always Hit The Snooze Button, Here's 33 Things To Help You Get Ready Quickly In 2025
articles.author: Kayla Boyd
articles.summary: This article features 33 product recommendations, all available on Amazon or Etsy, designed to streamline morning routines and save time.  The products range from beauty items like dry shampoo foam, BB cream, and makeup correcting sticks, to convenience items such as sunrise alarm clocks, elastic lock laces, and automatic toothpaste dispensers.

articles.title: Cardi B flashes legs in a plaid skirt as she hosts wild whipped cream event in New Orleans
articles.author: Daily Mail
articles.summary: Cardi B promoted Whipshots, her vodka-infused whipped cream brand, in New Orleans.

articles.title: India's AI Renaissance: Bridging Tradition and Innovation with LLMs
articles.author: Mediawire
articles.summary: New Dream Network (NDN) is pioneering the development of indigenous Large Language Models (LLMs) tailored for India, focusing on linguistic diversity and cultural nuances. These India-centric LLMs aim to produce context-aware outputs reflecting India's landscape. This initiative is a step toward AI sovereignty, reducing dependence on foreign technologies.

articles.title: Shoppers set to love Stanley cup dupes in Aldi middle aisle for fraction of €45 price tag
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the Crofton Stainless Steel Bottle, a dupe for the Stanley Cup, priced at €7.99. Additionally, Aldi introduced the Visage Iconic Hairdryer, a dupe for the Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer, retailing for €16.99.

articles.title: Hyper-personalisation: Has AI finally made retail's ‘holy grail' possible?
articles.author: Amber Murray
articles.summary: Eagle AI provides location-based offers, behavior-triggered promotions, and event-driven incentives, delivering personalized push offers to consumers in real time. Antavo's research indicates that personalized loyalty programs yield a significant return on investment for advertisers. Retailers are increasingly investing in social media content and utilizing AI to deliver hyper-personalized ads, particularly on platforms like YouTube.

articles.title: Azerbaijan expands market reach with online sales in Turkmenistan
articles.author: Qabil Ashirov Read more
articles.summary: Azerbaijan has launched online sales of its "Made in Azerbaijan" branded products in Turkmenistan. This initiative expands the market reach for these products through a new online sales channel.

articles.title: Dunelm's £69 'space saver' trolley that's 'useful' and 'sturdy'
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: Dunelm's 'Fulton Tall Slim Trolley' is receiving positive feedback from customers, who describe it as a 'beautiful addition' to their kitchens and note that it 'looked more expensive than it was'. The trolley is being praised for its aesthetics and perceived value.

articles.title: 'Classy' personalised satin pyjamas now less than £10 at Asda
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Asda has reduced the price of their Black Letter pyjamas from £18 to £9. The pyjamas are made from soft satin, feature a black-and-white design with an embroidered initial, and are available in sizes four to 22.

articles.title: The dreaded folding phone screen crease could soon be a thing of the past
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Oppo is teasing its upcoming Find N5 foldable phone. The teaser image highlights the phone's nearly invisible crease feature.

articles.title: You Can Now Use ChatGPT Without Creating An OpenAI Account
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT on its website without requiring users to create an account. This allows access to the large language model without the need for sign-up.

articles.title: How AI is changing fashion and what it means for entrepreneurs
articles.author: Phebe Ejinkeonye-Christian
articles.summary: AI is transforming the fashion industry by enabling brands to predict trends, personalize shopping experiences, and offer virtual fitting rooms through platforms like Zyler, Clo3D, and Style.me. AI also facilitates sustainable practices through tools like TextileGenesis and optimizes production processes by automating pattern-making and quality control, enhancing efficiency and reducing waste.

articles.title: NewPipe: Ad-Free, Privacy-Focused YouTube App for Android
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: NewPipe, developed by David Lin, is a new free and open-source Android application providing a privacy-focused and ad-free alternative to YouTube. The application avoids personalized algorithms and direct Google account integration offering features such as background playback, picture-in-picture mode, and video downloads for offline viewing, thus empowering users with more control over their data and content consumption.

articles.title: Acer's new gaming laptops with AI power won't hurt your pockets
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Acer has announced two new Helios Neo brand laptops.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy S25 Series in Bahrain, pioneering a new era of AI-powered mobile experiences
articles.author: bizbahrain
articles.summary: Samsung Gulf Electronics introduced the Galaxy S25 Series in Bahrain, which includes the Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25. This new series focuses on mobile AI innovations to provide more natural and context-aware mobile experiences.

articles.title: Highly anticipated BYD Sealion 7 specs revealed ahead of official launch
articles.author: Riz Akhtar
articles.summary: BYD is launching the Sealion 7 SUV in Australia later this month, offering Premium and Performance variants. The Sealion 7 features an 82.56 kWh battery pack, with the Premium model offering 482 km range and the Performance model offering 456 km. Pricing is expected to start under $60,000.

articles.title: Evolus Reports Inducement Grants Under Nasdaq Listing Rule 5635(c)(4)
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Evolus plans to launch Evolysse in the US and Estyme in Europe starting in 2025. These injectable hyaluronic acid (HA) gels are currently awaiting regulatory approval. Evolus aims to expand its product portfolio with these new aesthetics offerings.

articles.title: Engadget review recap: Samsung's Galaxy S25 phones, OnePlus 13 and Oura Ring 4
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its latest premium phones. Reviews of these devices and other products are being published as February begins.

articles.title: New Platform Streamlines Entrepreneurial Path for Franchisees
articles.author: Matthew Liedke
articles.summary: Alex Smereczniak launched Franzy, a digital platform that uses AI to connect potential franchisees with franchise opportunities. Franzy aims to provide comprehensive data and tools for franchisees, including brand information and comparisons. The platform generates revenue from franchisors when a lead becomes a franchisee.
